participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, Jake enjoys exploring the great outdoors and is always open to new experiences.
participant_1.background: I love to drink whiskey. I work as a janitor. I wear contacts. I am very smart. I love the outdoors.

participant_2.name: Akira
participant_2.personality: Passionate and creative, Akira loves teaching and sharing her culture, with a playful side that enjoys video games and anime.
participant_2.background: I still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult. I'm still single at the age of 35. My dog's name is wonwon. I came from Japan to teach high school over 10 years ago. I teach both Japanese and drawing classes.

content.text: Hey there! What do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking and camping. I also like to play video games and watch anime.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go hiking too, but I'm not very good at camping. I've never tried video games or anime.
You should try them! They're both really fun.
I might just do that. What's your favorite anime?
My favorite anime is probably "Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood". It's a really good story.
I've heard good things about that one. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
So, what else do you do for fun?
I like to go to the movies and concerts. I also like to read and write.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go to the movies too, but I don't really go to concerts. I like to read and write too.
That's cool. What do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things. I like historical fiction, fantasy, and science fiction.
That's cool. I like to read a lot of different things too. I like historical fiction, romance, and mystery.
That's cool. We should exchange book recommendations sometime.
That sounds like a great idea!
So, what do you do for work?
I teach Japanese and drawing classes at a high school.
Oh, that sounds cool! I've always wanted to learn Japanese.
You should! It's a really beautiful language.
I might just do that. Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome!
So, how long have you been teaching?
I've been teaching for over 10 years now.
Oh, that's a long time!
Yeah, it is. I love teaching.
That's great. I'm glad you love your job.
Thanks! I am.
